name: United Dominion Realty Trust
overview:

Thatâ€™s why today they have almost a quarter of a million residents in over 150 communities across the country. Great locations and service. Excellent values for all lifestyles. Welcome home.

Start with an apartment community that is conveniently located and peaceful, and where you can relax in your quality apartment home. Smart means offering an apartment with a new kitchen and bathrooms and energy efficient appliances. Smart also means providing a high level of service to their residents â€“ the kind of service they expect and deserve. They believe whatâ€™s good for their apartment residents is good for us. So what are you waiting for? Choose your smart apartment living now.

Looking for a quality apartment to rent and best service in the business? Want to pay rent, request maintenance, and receive apartment pricing and incentive updates online? The UDR “always open” mantra is instilled in their sales and service associates who share a common focus â€“ providing great service and making apartment living easy for you. Welcome to UDR â€“ where they open doors to the future.
